subtitleNullable: Dataset is scraped daily for news in english on various topics in India
descriptionNullable:
The dataset is scraped and updated daily, it has scraped news on various topics (the category of the headline is mentioned in the dataset) from inshorts.com
 You get 4 datapoints for each row:
1. `Headline`
2. `Content`
3. `Category`
4. `Date (of scraping)`

I initially made the dataset for a research project that required classification of news, I decided to update it on a daily basis for others to use :)
title: Inshorts Dataset - English News
subtitle: Dataset is scraped daily for news in english on various topics in India
description:
The dataset is scraped and updated daily, it has scraped news on various topics (the category of the headline is mentioned in the dataset) from inshorts.com
 You get 4 datapoints for each row:

4. `Date (of scraping)`

I initially made the dataset for a research project that required classification of news, I decided to update it on a daily basis for others to use :)
